title: RNAcentral Entry object
description: A simple representation of genes for RNAcentral

geneId.description: The prefixed primary (MOD) ID for a gene. For internal use, e.g. FB:FBgn0003301, MGI:87917.

symbol.description: The gene symbol for this entry.

name.description: A name of this gene. This should be a human readable name.

url.description: The url for this gene. Ideally this is in the expert database, but could be a reference to a different site if desired.

synonyms.description: A list of other symbols for the gene
